formerName.label: Former or alternate name(s)
formerName.tooltip: Provide any name(s) you have used during high school or college. This includes maiden names, nicknames, aliases or previous legal names. This is required to properly match your records.
formerName.text: If you have had a former name, please let us know.

legalSex.label: Legal sex
legalSex.tooltip: Legal sex should match what is marked on documents such as your birth certificate, state ID or driver’s license. This is required for federal reporting purposes. Unfortunately, some requirements are not inclusive of intersex students or students who do not identify as male or female. But ASU welcomes and encourages all students to apply.

formInfo.title: Gender and pronouns
formInfo.text: You can share more about your gender identity and pronouns in your

homeAddress.label: Home address
homeAddress.tooltip: We ask this for communication purposes regarding your application.
homeAddress.text: Begin by selecting your home country.

formInfo.title: Phone numbers
formInfo.text: You can edit your phone numbers in your

ethnicOrRacial.label: Ethnic/racial background
ethnicOrRacial.tooltip: We ask this for federal reporting purposes to the U.S. Department of Education
ethnicOrRacial.primaryRaceLabel: Please select one of the chosen ethnicities / races that the applicant considers himself/herself to be. This is documented for reporting purposes.

usCitizenship.label: U.S. citizenship
usCitizenship.tooltip: We ask this for federal reporting purposes to the U.S. Department of Education
usCitizenship.text: Begin by selecting your citizenship status. Some responses require additional information.

options.text: I am not a U.S. citizen

countryOfBirth.label: Country of birth
countryOfBirth.tooltip: We ask this for federal reporting purposes to the U.S. Department of Education.

USssn.label: Social Security Number
USssn.tooltip: We ask this for federal reporting purposes to the U.S. Department of Education and for IRS tax reporting purposes.

typeOfVisa.label: What type of visa will you be holding?
typeOfVisa.tooltip: We ask this for federal reporting purposes to the U.S. Department of Education.

options.text: International attending ASU Online programs only (JN)

items.title: Permanent resident
items.text: If you have only high school transcripts and have not completed any college courses, then you only need to submit high school transcripts. This includes GED transcripts.

items.title: Deferred Action for Childhood Arrivals (DACA)
items.text: If you have only high school transcripts and have not completed any college courses, then you only need to submit high school transcripts. This includes GED transcripts.

items.title: Student (F-1)
items.text: If you have only high school transcripts and have not completed any college courses, then you only need to submit high school transcripts. This includes GED transcripts.

items.title: Exchange Visitor (J-1)
items.text: If you have only high school transcripts and have not completed any college courses, then you only need to submit high school transcripts. This includes GED transcripts.

items.title: International attending ASU Online programs only (JN)
items.text: If you have only high school transcripts and have not completed any college courses, then you only need to submit high school transcripts. This includes GED transcripts.

typeOfVisa.previewLabel: Which type of visa will you be holding?

f1VisaError.text: If you intend to study in the United States, please be aware that online programs are not eligible for F-1.
f1VisaError.subText: If you are interested in attending an on campus program, please

issuingI20.label: For the purposes of issuing an I-20 and obtaining a Student Visa, are you currently in the United States on any kind of Student Visa?

addressLine1.label: Address line 1
addressLine1.placeholder: Street and number, P.O. box, c/o.

addressLine2.label: Address line 2
addressLine2.placeholder: Apartment, suite, unit, building, floor, etc.

shippingAddress.label: I-20 shipping address
shippingAddress.text: Choose where you would like your I-20 to be shipped

guardian.label: Parent or legal guardian
guardian.tooltip: If you are under the age of 18, you are considered a dependent. Please provide your parent or legal guardian information.

highestSchoolingLevel.label: Highest level of schooling completed
highestSchoolingLevel.previewLabel: Parent or Legal Guardian Schooling Level

previousAsuStudent.label: Did this guardian attend ASU?
previousAsuStudent.previewLabel: Parent or Legal Guardian Attended ASU

guardian.requiredAlertMessage: To save a parent or legal guardian, you must fill out all the fields in this section. Otherwise, please click “Clear fields” below.

asuAffiliation.label: Previous ASU affiliation
asuAffiliation.tooltip: This is required to match your ASU records in the readmission process. If you do not mark that you are a readmission student, your former credits may not transfer to your new record.

options.text: I previously attended ASU as an undergraduate degree-seeking student
I attended ASU as a nondegree or graduate student
I attended Global Freshman Academy or any transfer pathway program
I am currently or previously was an ASU employee
I attended ASU as part of a summer program in high school
Other (i.e., applied but never enrolled, season ticket holder, etc.)
I have never been affiliated with Arizona State University

affiliateId.label: What is your ASU Affiliate ID?

usUniformedServices.label: Affiliation to U.S. Uniformed Services
usUniformedServices.tooltip: If you or a family member have served or currently serve, you may qualify for additional financial aid or be interested in special engagement opportunities at ASU.
usUniformedServices.text: If you are affiliated with U.S. Uniformed Services, we will ask for additional information.

options.text: I am a U.S. service member or veteran
options.value: I am a U.S. service member or veteran

options.text: I am the spouse/dependent of a U.S. service member or veteran
options.value: Spouse/Dependent of a U.S. service member or veteran

options.text: None of these options apply to me

status.label: Choose the status that best applies to you:

branch.spouseLabel: Select your spouse or guardian’s branch of service:

defaultOptions.text: United States Public Health Service Commissioned Corps
National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration Commissioned Officer Corps

appliedForBenefit.label: I have applied or plan to apply for Department of Veterans Affairs educational benefits based on my U.S. services affiliation identified above:

requestTranscript.label: I authorize Arizona State University to request my Joint Service Transcript on my behalf.

partnerBenefits.label: Partner benefits
partnerBenefits.tooltip: Your response has no impact on your admission. ASU may use this information for benefit eligibility verification, reporting and communication purposes about the education partnership with ASU.
partnerBenefits.text: Do you plan to use an education benefit or scholarship through an employer, corporation, foundation or other ASU education partner?

currentEmployer.label: What is the name of your current employer?
